name: Pipal Research Coporation
overview: Pipal Research Corporation was founded in Chicago, IL in 2001, in Chicago, by former McKinsey & Company consultants and researchers with a passion for delivering high quality, independent and insightful research to worldâ€™s leading organizations. Since then Pipal Research has grown to become one of the leading independent research firm by leveraging its distinctive insights, incisive analysis and global delivery capabilities. Pipal Research has been recognized by well-respected publications such as The Wall Street Journal, Business Week and The Economist as one of the high-end research firms. Pipal Research is solely focused on research and analytics, and provides a broad range of services in corporate intelligence, quantitative analytics, financial research, and knowledge management.
